title: Example New Robot
description: This is an example of how to add a new robot to your encyclopedia using the modular system.
fullDescription: This example robot demonstrates the new modular robot management system. You can create individual JSON files for each new robot, making it easier to manage your growing collection without having one massive robots.json file. Simply create a new file like this one, add it to the data/robots/ directory, and update the index.json file to include it.

specifications.Sensors: Advanced AI vision system, LIDAR, ultrasonic sensors

capabilities: Advanced Navigation: Autonomous movement through complex environments
Task Automation: Performs various service tasks with minimal supervision
Human Interaction: Natural language processing for communication
Adaptive Learning: Improves performance through experience
applications: Retail: Customer service and inventory management
Education: Teaching assistant and learning support
